name: What do you seek? Subconscious test
description:
Hey guys, haven't posted in a while but found this incredible 10 - 15 mins test that's quite interesting. The most important thing? It only requires 4 simple steps!


It requires you to jot down 16 aspects of whatever is most important in your life and then deleting them right after you've finished writing them down - the point is to seek the first few that's been deleted and the few that's been left.


While it has not been peer reviewed but it is very similar to the concept of the Stanford Life Design Life in which you can check it out here: http://lifedesignlab.stanford.edu/


Have fun & keep on exploring!
